snippet: The mother of a 7-year-old boy found wandering barefoot on Interstate freeway lanes early today and her boyfriend were under arrest after abandoning the child at a remote site as a discipline lesson, the authorities said.    The child was forced o...
lead_paragraph: The mother of a 7-year-old boy found wandering barefoot on Interstate freeway lanes early today and her boyfriend were under arrest after abandoning the child at a remote site as a discipline lesson, the authorities said. The child was forced out of a car into darkness after midnight in rural Yolo County northwest of Sacramento, sheriff's investigators said. The boy also was forced to leave his shoes and jacket in the vehicle.
abstract: Frances Elaine Onidas, mother of 7-year-old boy found wandering barefoot on Interstate freeway in rural Yolo County, Calif, and her boyfriend, Lowell Russell Thornton, are arrested for abandoning child as discipline lesson (S)

headline.main: Boy Found on Freeway; His Mother Is Arrested
